reviewText: Awesome anime!!! Great characters, scenes, stories, and the plot is really good.
I love this anime. It is one of my favorites for more mature anime.

This series is awesome if you are attracted to knowledge about the dark world that coexists with this one. The series is packed with things that are only known by people deep into the occult. Things that the masses aren't allowed to know. Knowledge of this world that people think is fictitious. The belief that the dead walk among us would be laughed and/or frowned upon by the typical human except for the elect and select few who can see beyond the limitations of their own senses into the beyond. If you are the type of person who likes to see into the unknown and are unafraid of learning about the world that no one wants to talk about then this series for you. A real truth seeker loves shows like this.  The writers have done an excellent job of teaching and entertaining at the same time.

Here I would like to recommend one of my favorite animation works Requiem from the Darkness Requiem from the Darkness is a traditional Japanese style animation quite cruel and stylish. In the animation, the doings which seem done by ghosts are actually done by human beings with certain purposes. It presents the dark side of humans which is quite shocking. The English version of the original novel is also excellent. The Wicked and the Damned: A Hundred Tales of Karma Vol. 1The Wicked and the Damned: A Hundred Tales of Karma Vol. 2The Wicked and the Damned: A Hundred Tales of Karma Vol. 3The Wicked and the Damned: A Hundred Tales of Karma Vol. 4The Wicked and the Damned: A Hundred Tales of Karma Vol. 5The Wicked and the Damned: A Hundred Tales of Karma Vol. 6The Wicked and the Damned: A Hundred Tales of Karma Vol. 7

Delivered right on time as always from Amazon. This is a great anime series. Very unusual style and stories. The English voices are perfect for the characters. Highly recommend this one for those that enjoy Japanese anime, but want something a little different. Very different.
